New Records: Moeen Ali and Akeal Hosein need one wicket each to reach 50 T20I wickets
West Indies have played three previous T20Is in St Lucia and have never lost
West Indies won 3-2 against England in their T20I series in December
Key Match Events: England won the match by 8 wickets
The match was high-scoring with a belter of a surface
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies captain Rovman Powell emphasized the importance of the match
England's form and preparation were discussed
The match was anticipated as a high-octane duel between two-time champions
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was known for being high-scoring
West Indies had a strong home record at the venue
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
The venue was the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium
